name: Number-Specific Enemy Annihilation Check
description: This actor is triggered when a certain number of enemies have been defeated.
InternalName: 敵の数指定全滅チェック

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that triggers this actor when the condition is met.

fields.name: Flag Values
fields.description: Indicates the type of condition or behavior for the actor based on these values.

fields.name: Enemy Defeat Threshold
fields.description: The number of enemies that need to be defeated to trigger the event.
